lines.text: Sandstone's greatest weakness. Poison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All right, so. You bring your hand out towards the creature, you release this sudden burst of poisonous gas--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I'm panicking, assholes, I'm freaking held up by the top of my head, this is really excruciating pain, I may have made a poor decision, I don't know, I'm just doing something!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the cloud swarms around the entity, it does not seem to be affected by the presence of poison, as its physical form does not fall under the category of a natural living entity. However, you can use your movement to try and break free of the grapple.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: So I try to run away--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you try and break out. Go ahead and you can make either an athletics or an acrobatics roll, your choice.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Well--

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: You should acrobatics. (laughs)

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Acrobatics.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and roll acrobatics.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Okay, that's 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12? All right! You manage to just squeeze out of its grip, land on your feet, and get back about five feet. It's still right in front of you, but you're no longer in its grasp.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Slippery bastard!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so as its turn it's going to do Frenzied Punches, it's gonna do an attack on both of you. Just giant fists, it clenches its fingers together into two giant hammers of sandstone.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Ah, dammit, no, I can't take this kind of punishment! You're supposed to take these!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 16 against you.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: My armor class is 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It just manages to impact. So as one fist goes, bang, hitting you right in the breadbasket, you can feel the armor absorbs a lot of the blow, but it still nearly knocks the wind out of you.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Not the basket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take seven points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: God damn!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it pulls its fist back, it backhands towards you.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Of course, yeah, it gives me the backhand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's gonna be an eight. What's your armor class?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. You duck beneath the arc, and it swings wildly, missing you entirely.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: All our luck's been wasted on you, man. That hurt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ulfgar, it's your turn now, as you recover from the blow.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: You got this, you got this!

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Oh, nobody punches me in the chest and lives to tell the tale. So I'm gonna go ahead and slice-and-dice. All right, Regina! I swing for--

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: His right-hand sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits. Roll the second attack.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: You announce it. "His right-hand sword!"

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: I just love color commentary.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: And Linda! And with Linda I swing for 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit. Go ahead and roll damage on both strikes.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Oh yeah! (laughs) So, um. Regina smacks for five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five damage.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Linda smacks for 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice! So you bring both swings down simultaneously, streaking an X-mark strike across its back. As you do, you carve a sizeable rock from the side of its back. As the stones tumble off of its torso, and its shoulder area, it hits the ground and they just turn to dust upon impact with the ground. You can see now, within the sandstone in the center, there is kind of a crackling arcane energy, almost like a spider-like electricity that is holding its form together that is the same color as the stone in the center of the room. Do you want to move at all, or are you going to stay where you are?

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: I think I'm gonna stay there and actually use an Action Surge to swing at the innards of this beast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll another attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, snap!

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Like the Magic School Bus, going inside.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: That is going to be 14.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I knew I should've stayed home today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. With this action-surge strike you go, and you bring your sword down. As your sword gets within a few inches of the back, a bit of that blue energy arcs out and hits the blade, causing your hand to recoil instinctively. You drop the weapon for a second from the sheer shock of it, realize what you've done, and reach down and pick it up again. It manages to knock your attack out of use, unfortunately.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Oh. Go for the crystal! I think the blue stuff might work!

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Yeah, you think?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us up to the top. Salty, you're up.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: All right--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Do it again, I know I said it was stupid last time, but go for it!

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: I'm gonna believe in myself. I'm gonna sprint towards the crystal, leap through the air, doing a flip, grabbing it, and taking it out of its hold.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Is the flip just natural? You just had to add the flip?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Go for broke.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an acrobatics roll.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: This die is terrible. This is hot garbage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Another die!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (splash) Splashing liquid all over your back and torso, you tumble off, slide across to the side of the room, slam!, hitting the opposite side of the wall on your back, your feet, ass-up, ass-over-teakettle.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are considered prone and you take three points of acid damage from splashing into the liquid.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Oh, god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Snugglelord, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Believing in yourself is a lie. Once again, D&D teaches real life lessons.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: It's coming for me!

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: I almost got it!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I know! Man. It's a--

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Are you casting a spell called Friends?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Oh, no I can't, no I can't. I can't do it because he's hostile towards me. I cast fire into the weak spot on the back to see if fire does anything to disrupt the energy that's inside it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What spell are you using for that?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Thauma--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thaumaturgy?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Thaumaturgy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you focus for a second, you raise your hand up in the air, using your demonic heritage to call forth some infernal fire that bursts for a second in the center of where that electricity is. It sparks up and then is snuffed, no seeming effect.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Am I allowed to move after that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move after that, yeah.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I move a couple steps back, like, whoa, shit shit shit shit shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you carefully step away. It takes a swing at you as you step out of its range. That is gonna be--

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Attack of opportunity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- 11. Which I believe misses you.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you step out of the way, it comes down with a giant fist hammer-blow style, as you sidestep out of the way, as it cracks some of the stone on the ground.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Can we all take a second to laugh at how great what Salty just did was, because that was amazing!

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: It was pretty great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ulfgar, you're up.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: I'm in so much pain.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: All right. Am I close enough to the crystal to run towards it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, you'd probably take an attack from the creature, but--

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: All right. Yeah, I run towards it, safely, not trying to do any fancy flips or anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so as you rush past, it swings out at you. That's gonna be a 14. I think you said your AC's 16?

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you just, it glances off your shoulder, you take the blow but keep pushing forward with the sheer force of your dwarven physical self.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Woo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you leap just over the liquid, I'm just gonna make you, have you do a quick athletics roll.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: All right. I rolled 24.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Oh, come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You leap across, three-point landing.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Kobe!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You stand up, the orb's there in front of you. You wanted to grab the orb, you said? You wanna grab the orb, you said?

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You grab the orb, you pull it off the pedestal. Make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: I, so, constitution. I roll a god damn 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24. As you clutch the orb, you can feel for a moment the electrical energy surging through your forearms and into your body, and for a second your muscles tense and you feel like your physical form is being slowed down, but you shrug it off for a second as you're clutching it in your hands right now. You're looking at it, you've pulled it off of the pedestal. As you pull it off the pedestal, it leaves a couple trails of sparks off the top that stretch out between the pedestal and where you're pulling the orb off. You look back and the entity currently is looking like it's slowing in its physical ability to move around when it's in your grasp, but it's still turning around towards you, kind of looking, noticing that you've now grabbed something that is inherently connected to its physicality.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: All right. Then I break it and say, "I own you!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Great breath control.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14? All right. You take the orb, you spike it on the ground, and you see it crack upon the impact. It doesn't break, but a big solid crack suddenly spiders through the entire interior of the orb, as it rolls off and into the liquid on the outskirts. You can see the electrical center in the center of the sandstone golem flicker and flash with light, and you see one of its arms hits the ground behind it and scatters into dust and sand. It's still keeping its form together, and it's kind of lurching towards you with its other arm rearing back for some sort of an attack, but it looks like it's having a really hard time holding itself together. That's gonna end your turn. Salty, you're up.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Salty, you gotta put your hand in the juice again! You gotta put your hand in that juice, get that orb.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: You can't be serious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Believe! Believe, Salty!

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: No, it never works.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Just put your hand in the juice!

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: I'm going to-- so if I'm not mistaken, I can expend a hit die to regain some health, is that true?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can during a rest, not in the middle of combat, unfortunately.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: (laughs) You got this, baby!

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: All right. I've got, I think I have three hit points left, maybe? Five or three. Somewhere, I think I'm at five. So, sorry, the orb is in--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's currently-- he slammed it into the ground, it cracked, and it rolled into the moat on the-- to you it would be on the right side of the building right now.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Oh, come on. All right. I'm going to take my cape, wrap it around my arm, and just run and scoop it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you use half your movement to get up, and you rush towards, you can get just to the outside of it, 'cause you can see a little bit of the blue interior. You reach down inside, you pull it up. I want you to go ahead and make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: You got this, Salty!

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Not using that die again.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I kind of believe in you!

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Oh, you shouldn't have done that. That'll be a seven.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no, Salty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find yourself held in place, unable to move.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Guys, little help?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. That brings us to Snugglelord, what you got?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Shit!

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: It's the orb, break that orb, man! It's the orb.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I pull out my crossbow.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Oh no, no! Anything but that!

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: I always knew it would end like this. That's what the gypsy woman said.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have other spells.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Not really, I picked terrible spells for this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your first-level spells, you have three you should have.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, what's your melee weapon?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Eldritch Blast, Eldritch Blast!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I have a handaxe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have Eldritch Blast?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have Eldritch Blast?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, he doesn't have Eldritch Blast.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I am worthless in a battle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Smash it!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Okay, I'm gonna smash it, I'm gonna run up and smash it in his hand.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Please, no!

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Don't worry, don't worry, Salty, I'll drink to your name!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I'm honestly not worried about his hand, he's already lost a lot of use of it, the skin is gone, like, he'll be, it doesn't matter, you're not gonna masturbate with that thing anyway anymore.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: I never did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Snugglelord's tiefling form darts in and in the shaded interior of the room runs across. Go ahead and just make an acrobatics check real fast as you cross the moat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, sever his wanking hand, classic dwarven move!

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Classic tiefling betrayal!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Okay, all right. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. You leap over without an issue, you actually tumble and roll on the ground. As you come up, you use the inertia to swing your axe in a wide arc down towards his hand. Roll an attack.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: I'll drink to your name, man, 'cause you're about to be dead!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Okay, what do I add on these?

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: 15? You beat a 14 armor class, you hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dan Casey, still in character, holding up the orb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so go ahead and roll damage for the axe.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Oh, this is gonna suck.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: What do I do for damage dice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 1d6 and add your strength modifier to it.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Well, that's nothing.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Zero.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: One.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's for the attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One's all you needed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One's all he needed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The crystal is already heavily damaged. You bring the axe down.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Ah, god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It shatters the crystal into a hundred pieces across the room. I want you to go ahead and roll another damage attack on his hand.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Fucking great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many hit points did you have left?

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Five on a good day. Three more realistically.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Low roll, low roll, low roll.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: That's a whammy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as the crystal shatters, you can see the golem form, which is coming up behind you with a giant piston-like hand, suddenly just vanishes into dust and sparks as it scatters across the ground. The axe swings through, and you're extremely excited at the impact as you look up and see what is a fingerless half-hand now bleeding profusely.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Haha, you look better now!

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Oh, everybody's a fucking comedian.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is the last words you say before you fall unconscious on the ground from the severe shock and blood loss.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We did it!

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Aw man, I really liked that dude, man.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: He's fine, he just lost some fingers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as he's now unconscious on the ground, bleeding out, does anyone wanna try and help him?

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Yeah, I'm gonna try and resurrect him in some way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have a medicine kit or anything like that?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I don't have one.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, say yes, Thaumaturgy.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: I just have the dungeoneer's kit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, make a medicine check.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Cauterize the wound.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you trying to say stop the bleeding with Thaumaturgy? Is that what you're trying to say?

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Yeah, cauterize my stump.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: By screaming at it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He could stick a dagger into the end of that, he'll be fine.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Or that spicy fingerblast.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: I rolled 17 for medicine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. Okay. We'll say between the two of you working together to bring out some material, you rip off part of a cloth you had stored in your bag, you use Thaumaturgy to go ahead and cauterize the wound, eventually you stop the bleeding, you wrap it up, you wait a few moments and he comes to slow consciousness, sore, worse for wear, but alive nevertheless.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: You did good.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Hey, man.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: I beat the golem. I did it.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: You did all of it, it was all you.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: I'm going to cough blood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he does.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Just want to get you guys invoiced, that gem that you guys destroyed was probably worth like 500 gold, so y'all both are in debt--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: You're still getting paid, you're still getting paid.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Classic dwarven accounting.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We'll just go back to the bad father, he'll give you your money.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, you totally gave up your share, so it's between me and Salty.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I remember that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do notice as you're on the ground, looking around, suddenly the brackish liquid that's surrounded it seems to have lost a lot of its darker viscous aspect and now it's kind of clear, smooth, pure water.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: I am gonna plunge my mangled paw into that clear-ass water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is cold and slightly helpful in soothing the pain, and you are glad for once since you arrived here to see some water that is not absolutely terrifying.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Thank god for that.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Yeah, man, we did it.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: It's good, it's good.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: So do you want me to pick up your fingers, or?

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Yeah, that'd be fucking great.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: All right, so I put his fingers in my pack.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: I'm a little shorthanded.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Finger-scouting mission.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One, two-- where are the other three?

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Perception-- ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find two fingers. God knows where, the rest are buried either somewhere in the remains of the sand creature or somewhere else in the room, but after a good five minutes of scouting you manage to find two of the digits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He can still rock on, though.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's all you need.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: It's all I have. Surf's up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys slowly find your way back up to the top of the pile of sand that led you into this chamber, you look up and you can see there's a small bit of light, and you hear a voice echoing through going, "Hello? Hello?"

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Yeah, we are down here and all the trouble seems to be gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're alive?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Yeah, well--

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: You could say that.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We're kind of okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay, hold on!" And eventually over a few minutes you see a small rope being let down.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Oh, that's what I like to see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One by one they pull you up.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: You know, I do like those ropes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One by one they pull you back up through the surface. You find yourselves at the center of the town, and everyone's gathered around with what seems to be a slightly more positive demeanor to them. As you guys all get up there, Lily runs up and gives you all an immediate hug and says, "Thank you. I felt it lift. I felt the darkness in my mind disappear. Whatever you did, it worked, "you've lifted the curse."

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Please, please, please, don't shower us with all of your riches and food and foul women--

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: This guy's delirious, we're fighting on gold--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: If you must, if you must throw all of those things at us as some sort of reward for the good deed we have just done, that would be wonderful and great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of them kind of look at each other, and you can see there are a few people now stepped out of the tents, some of them almost lepers in the way that they're bandaged, just going, uh, and the old woman goes, "We haven't much in the way of food, but we've pooled our resources." And she looks to the halfling male, apparently the father figure to Lily, who says, "A promise is a "promise." And he reaches back and he pulls out a pouch. You can see it's hefty, full of coins. And looks to who to plop it to immediately.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: It's over here. He gave it away in the battle.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: He's not gonna catch it. He's not gonna catch it.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Oh yeah, great, make fun of the cripple.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Yeah, all right. You know, Lily, I just wanna say, I really liked these moments we shared together. I think that we make a good team, and I'd love for you to continue on this adventure with us so we can get to know each other.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: The sandstones on this one.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: You know, it's like, you know, it's like an adventure date.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion roll against her father.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks at you at you with a smile, looks at her father who goes--

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: No, man, I saved your town.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you've been paid for it."

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: All right, all right.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: What about this? We want the crone with the violin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks ecstatic at the prospect that somebody even noticed her playing, goes, "Can I? "Can I?" Looks back at her and goes, "Certainly." "Great, I'll get my stuff!"

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Are you sure?

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: I love music. Play something baroque.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She grabs in her tent and pulls out a small sack, throws it over her shoulder. With the other hand she pulls out this tiny, crappy-ass violin that looks like it's seen better days on the road, and begins to play against the side of her shoulder this withering 'eeeeeee'.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Great, we now have the saddest fucking traveling group of misfits I've ever seen in my life.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Hey, let the dude with the nubs have his, you know--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Yeah, you got all the money, you handle the money.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Classic dwarf dabs.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: He's without fingers, I've got nothing out of this.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: I've got seven. Lucky number.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what is the name of your party? What is the title of your traveling band?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is it? Party title, party title.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Nub 'n' butters.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Nub 'n' butters?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: It seems like something this guy would say.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: The good, the rad, and the nubbly.

lines.name: ZAC, DAN
lines.text: The good, the rad, and the nubbly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The good, the rad, and the nubbly? I like that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All about that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you've seen and enjoyed the adventure of the good, the bad-- the good, the rad, and the nubbly. Completely improvised roleplaying experience.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I'm the good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well done, guys, that was awesome, that was fun to watch.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Thank you, Matt, that was a lot of fun. This was my first roleplaying experience ever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was so good!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Never done one before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You looked so happy.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: This is fun. It's a lot of fun. I didn't have friends growing up, so I never got to play this.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Should've went to those--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: No, there weren't enough people, I lived in the woods.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: No, see, what I did is I went to the Gaia forums, if you went to the Go Gaia forums--

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Gaia? That little anime avatar? Super sick.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We didn't have internet. I didn't know these things existed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was the same way, I feel your pain.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Classic tale of childhood innovation.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: That's so sad.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's gonna have to be integrated somehow.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: All I hope is that the fans of Critical Role got some enjoyment out of that and that we get even an inkling of the fanart that you guys get when you do your show.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I'm sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Please, please, something!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I really wanna see Salty Pete with his cape.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Yeah, we didn't really get a good description of what you look like.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Oh, basically, you know, I look like a dark iron orc, which is like a grayish stone skin, I've got a Kimbo Slice beard going on.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Hell yes!

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: And I always wear my gold sack just out.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Flaunt it.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: So people know how much money I'm rocking with.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I basically look exactly like a tiefling wearing a unicorn onesie for no apparent reason whatsoever. I did cut a nice little tail-slot out the back, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good. That wasn't confusing at all for the horse you've been riding this whole time.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Well, that horse has seen better days now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you look like, Salty Pete?

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Well, Salty Pete strikes an imposing figure, he cuts a mean swath. Basically he's wearing a battered leather jerkin, some rich woolen pants to get him through those salty nights on the open seas. He also has a velvet doublet because you've gotta treat yourself right every now and then, and of course he's never seen without his signature black cape, which was once upon a time the flag flying high above the masts on the Obsidian Helen, the ship that he lusted after. He also has a grizzled gray beard, not Kimbo Slice-esque, more like Ser Davos Seaworthean in stature and size.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fantastic.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Straight out of central San Francisco.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would party so hard with you guys.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I've got these two on metal chains.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Well, I'm a polar bear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Metal chains. I've seen that at anime conventions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Get on it, artists.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I'm pretty sure in West Hollywood I've seen somebody walking down the street in this exact getup.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm pretty sure I have. So here's my question. 'Cause was this your first time playing D&D too, Dan?

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, hell no, you can tell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But this was your first time.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I've never done this, this was great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you feel like it was intimidating, the roleplaying aspect of it at first, and how-- did you feel any awkwardness easing into it?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: But yeah, a little intimidated by how vast the knowledge is that's incorporated into this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's a lot to throw you at once. You did really good with what was thrown at you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It does start to feel smaller. It does eventually start to feel, it's like learning how to juggle, you're like, ahh, and then suddenly it's like, okay.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Once you learn the basic math, it's basically just applying that to every situation, and once you get that down, it's just a matter of getting into the minutiae. And that's something that took me a while, 'cause math was not my strong suit--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Unless it's the number one, which I'll roll all day everyday.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Yeah, you were throwing number ones, man.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: I thought it was golf. No, once you learn that basic system, it's really cool, because you can extrapolate from that and apply it to every situation.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Nah.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: What?

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: I mean, that's literally how it works.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I was gonna say we could elaborate on Ify's D&D experiences, but I'd prefer to not travel down that trail.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Nah, I've been in a few groups. I'm currently in a UCB group, and I usually tend to play, I'm the guy who starts the fights all the time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I had a feeling.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Hector was in your group, and you guys killed him off, right?

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: That was actually Dale, it wasn't Darren, he's our only cleric and the one fight, the DM told me that, like, the fight initiated, monster went for Hector, critical hit, dead one shot, at the beginning of the encounter.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Brutal, brutal.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: And so the guys that I play with decided, because Hector missed a few, so, we'll just resurrect him when he comes back. And so we were playing last Sunday, and I was like, oh, what about Hector? And he goes, yeah, how long until we have to resurrect him? He goes, oh, it's about ten days. And I was like, how long has it been? He's like, in the game, it's been about a month. So his corpse is rotting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Should've put that in my iCalendar. Oh well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, we missed that resurrection appointment. Reschedule.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: And they weren't a month ago. We keep trying to add them to our wishlist to get more, and they're just out of stock. So we're working on getting some more so we can do them for giveaways and stuff, but when we get to 3,200, we'll give away some more. So sub if you can, it supports all of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys so much for watching. Any last comments you want to make before we sign off?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Thank you, coaches.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would love it if, what was your name again?

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Who, me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, the group, the group.

lines.name: MATT, DAN, IFY
lines.text: The good, the rad, and the nubbly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The good, the bad, and the nubbly.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: The good, the rad, and the nubbly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The good, the rad, and the nubbly could come back somehow and intersect with us.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: A multiverse.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: If we cross your path, run away, just run the fuck away, all right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit, it's the good, the rad, and the nubbly. Run! Run! They're the fuckups of Emon.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: You'll see us coming from a hill a long way away, the guy on the horse with the two dwarves on chains and leather behind him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're just that adventuring party where whenever you roll into town we're just like, (sighs heavily)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like the Blue Beetle and Booster Gold of the Critical Role--

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Classic skates.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you, thank you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I'd like to say to everybody who's watching that had those questions about how do you roleplay, how do you have fun, you just saw three dudes with different levels of experience having all an amazing time. And we loved every second of watching it, so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Doing something totally different than what we do.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No game has to be the same, you play it how you want, and that's a good time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I actually had someone tweeting at me being like, you know, talking about us mentioning how you shouldn't be intimidated by roleplaying, they said yes, but, conversely, not everyone's an actor. And I just want to address that, like, roleplaying has nothing to do with acting.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I am not an actor. Not an actor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With emphasis on "playing". So just play. It's not about coming up with a character and a motivation and any of that. It's just about playing.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Or that money.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or that money.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: It's about the damn money, baby.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Sometimes motivations are easy to come by, just tap that different part of yourself--

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Throw them gold pieces on the table. Throw them gold pieces on the table.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: There's a character inside each of you guys, just tap into that inner Ify and just put it out on the table.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As sarcastic as Zac is being, it's totally true.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's true, it is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's totally true, like, if you guys notice, they made their characters while Matt was talking about DMing, and then they had fully fleshed-out characters by the time they started playing, and mainly that's because they just had a few solid ideas, and then their characters built as the story unfolded. And that was great. That was awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And like I said earlier, if you are still intimidated, don't worry, you don't have to come out of the gate being completely open to it. Just find your way in, play as comfortable as you are, and work towards getting to that point where you're able to talk as that character, and just notify the rest of the party and your DM that you're working on it. And let them be respectful, and eventually you'll find your way comfortable to talk like it, if that's what you want. Some games just wanna be, you know, Diablo-style dungeon-crawlers, kill shit, get loot, and that's totally fine too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And seriously, if anyone judges you because of your roleplaying, fuck them, they shouldn't be in your game anymore.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Sneak attack. They won't expect it.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Sneaky Pete 'em!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Sneaky Pete 'em right in the face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just be willing to be stupid, because that's half the fun.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Friendly fire is on.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: I'm a big proponent of friendly fire.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Oh, Zac, do you like friendly fire?

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: Basically, quick story, last Sunday in our group we kidnapped a guy 'cause we were questioning him, and he just never was intimidated by me because early in the game I tried to bluff check to try and get him to give me 200 gold for no reason, and rolled a one, and so we had him, and so Dead Strongjaw is a barbarian, huge barbarian, like I rolled hot that night, I had 21 strength, so I tried to punch him to knock him out 'cause he started screaming for help, we ran inside his apartment, and I broke his jaw and we dragged him into a nearby cave and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where is this going?

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: -- so the whole time--

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: That man was Kanye West, through the wire.

lines.name: IFY
lines.text: So through that, our, we had this warlock or wizard who summoned this infernal mastiff to ride, and he was talking all this shit, so I rolled and punched his mastiff, and since it was a spell, I punched it out of existence, and that's when the archivist came to, and he was like, he just sees me punch it, and I kept saying we are good people, because I realized that I'm neutral good, so I didn't want to torture him. And then that's when the DM was like, just so you know, he came to, you punched a devilish mastiff out of existence, and yelled, "We're good people!" over and over to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll definitely be up next week for the continuation of the Critical Role storyline, picking up where K'Varn was defeated in the depths of the Temple of Yug'voril, the Illithid city deep beneath Kraghammer and see where the party goes from there.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Yay, I'm excited! (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A big round of applause for our coaches and hanging out here tonight, big round of applause--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Happy birthday, Liam!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Happy birthday, Liam!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Where's your cake?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where is your cake?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I dunno.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We had a cake for Liam. We gotta sing happy birthday. We have to sing happy birthday with the cake!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The non-licensed happy birthday, at least.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Oh, fuck it, we're gonna sing the licensed one, what are they gonna do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, fuck you, Twitch!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Do you really think that we're so on key that--

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: Winston Birthday is gonna sue us. Please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Winston Birthday.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Oh my gosh. We also have shirts for sale, guys! It's so hard.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: That was an amazing segue.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That was very Paul Blart, dude.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, no.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: My brain never stops thinking about how in the world we're gonna make this thing survive forever. Gotta get those subs and sell those shirts. By the way, guys, omgsteve from Team Hooman came by today, here's here now, he's been watching, hope you had a good time. You wanna wave hi to everybody?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, come on, say hello!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: He brought Liam cake and tasty treats, like, thank you so much.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, you're responsible for the potato balls! Yes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, thank, oh it was amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saved my ass. I didn't have enough time to get lunch today, and I came in and you'd brought all that, I was like, ahh, thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were waiting in line for potato balls and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we had to leave.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: -- and then we got here and there were potato balls.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I locked my keys in the car.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (sing) Happy birthday to you, happy birthday to you, happy birthday dear Liam... and Laura, happy birthday to you! (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cake attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's mine right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Classic birthday.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Classic birthday.

lines.name: DAN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys so much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Huzzah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Goodnight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Have a wonderful evening, we'll see you next week.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Bye!
